EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners - Time Card Reminder (1337030415.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners - Time Card Reminder (1337030415.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tom, You can disregard this message. It is geared towards consultants who do hourly work who may have forgotten to enter their time. If you want to turn off the notification you can do that in your account settings in the upper right hand menu. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Tom Glatt [mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com] Sent: Sunday, May 13, 2012 6:58 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Fwd: MBO Partners - Time Card Reminder Sara Can you fill me in on what this message means whenever you have a chance? No rush. Thanks!Tom Sent from my iPhone Begin forwarded message:From: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Date: May 13, 2012 3:56:55 PM PDT To: tglatt@glattconsulting.com <mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com> Subject: MBO Partners - Time Card ReminderAccording to our records, there is no time entered in the period indicated for the following work order(s):
Start Stop Work Order 04/01/2012 04/30/2012 Northern FCU 2012 Strategic Planning Tom Glatt 04/01/2012 04/30/2012 Northern FCU 2011/2012 CEO Comp. Eval. Tom Glatt
Click this link to go to login page: https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=TimeSheetEntry <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=TimeSheetEntry>
This is a system generated email that you have requested by selecting it on the System Notification page.
